name: experimenter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who carries out experiments (= tests to learn something or to discover if something works or is true): He was a great experimenter. The experimenter asks the children not to touch the doll and then leaves the room. See
experiment
More examplesFewer examplesPhysics experimenters send particles crashing into targets at enormous speeds to find previously undiscovered particles.She was particularly skilled as an experimenter.Some experimenters have injected stem cells into cardiac muscle and seen a few become cardiac cells.
